Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my keen interest in the Seamstress position advertised by Spots & Co. I am confident that my skills, experience, and enthusiasm will make me an excellent candidate for this role.

As a recent graduate with a Master's degree in fashion design from Goldsmiths University College, I am well-versed in various design techniques, textile science, and garment construction. My recent experience as a jobbing piecework seamstress has provided me with hands-on experience in sewing, embroidery, and tailoring. I believe that my skills will be highly valuable in creating high-quality ecclesiastical supplies, such as vestments, and other tailored and embroidered goods that Spots & Co is well known for.

In addition to my fashion design background, I have previous experience in copy-editing and internet communication. Having worked for seven years at Big Bad Tobacco in Switzerland, I have developed exceptional communication, organization, and time management skills. I am confident that I can bring these skills to Spots & Co, and contribute to the growth and success of the company.

Moreover, I am a keen motorcyclist, reader, and lover of classical music. I also have a great interest in religion and attend church regularly. I believe that working in a religious context will provide me with the perfect opportunity to combine my skills and interests. I am confident that I will fit well into the Spots & Co team, and contribute to the success of the company.

I have attached my CV, which provides more details about my education, experience, and skills. I look forward to hearing from you soon to discuss my application and how I can contribute to Spots & Co.

Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,

[Miss Christina-Joy Midwestern]
